title: Kelly Brown Hits Amazon Best-Seller List With Think and Grow Rich in Dentistry
text:
(MENAFN Press) Kelly Brown recently hit seven Amazon best-seller lists with the new book “Think and Grow Rich in Dentistry.” 
Edmond OK – September 1 2015 – Kelly Brown recently authored the book titled Think and Grow Rich in Dentistry . The book was released on July 16 2015 by CelebrityPress™ - a leading business book publisher.
On the day of release Think and Grow Rich in Dentistry reached best-seller status in two Amazon categories - reaching as high as #1 in the category “Dental Office Practices” and  #15 in “Dentistry.”
Dr. Kelly Brown is no stranger when it comes to knowing how it feels to struggle in a dental practice. After graduating from the University Of Oklahoma College Of Dentistry in 1976 he spent the first 10 years of his career in the bottom 5% of the dental industry until an unfortunate life event occurred that opened his eyes and changed his destiny forever.  Within the next few years he learned and implemented lessons that took his practice to the top of his industry. 
Today he and his son Dr. Nathan Brown use his practice building lessons to launch additional practices. With his Custom Dental joint venture model he has launched more from zero-to-a-million-dollar solo owner-operated dental practices than any other. Most the Custom Dental practices bust the million-dollar mark within the first 12 months even though he typically partners with relatively young and inexperienced dentists. He currently has joint-ventured with 11 practices in Oklahoma Texas and Missouri… with more on the way. 
CelebrityPress™ describes the book: 
Over the last 36 years dentistry government regulations employees and patients have all drastically changed. Naivety today comes with a very expensive price tag one that most dentists shouldn’t need to pay. Over the years Kelly trained mentored associated and partnered with well over 100 dentists. He birthed more solo dental practices than any other dentist in the world. With this book Kelly will guide readers around the pitfalls of going into private practice saving time and money. Use Kelly’s experience and knowledge to build wisdom and become a more productive profitable dental practitioner. 
After such a successful release Kelly Brown will be recognized by an organization that honors authors from many of the leading independent best-seller lists.
Clickto order a copy of Think and Grow Rich in Dentistry
More About Kelly Brown: 
Dr. Brown serves on a committee to assist and advise the Oklahoma Dental Board of Governors through the process of updating The Oklahoma State Dental Act Statutes and Rules.
He is a dentist lecturer radio talk show host and author. He has been published in Dentistry IQ and The Profitable Dentist journals.  He is the Founder and Chairman of Custom Dental the fastest growing joint venture owner-operated dental business in the world.
Dr. Brown was recently interviewed on the topic of “Annihilating the Big Box Dental Shops”  by 2-time Emmy Winner Nick Nanton on America’s Premiere Experts® which was seen on NBC ABC CBS and Fox affiliates across the United States. 
In his book Think and Grow Rich in Dentistry Dr. Brown reveals 55 time-tested principles for success that any dentist can use to launch a new practice or take an existing practice to the next level.
Dr. Brown’s previous titles include:
·      3 Secrets To Taking 10 Years Off Your Age Without Surgery
·       7 Secrets You Better Know Before Choosing Your Dentist
·      The 3 Simple Things You Can Do To Avoid Heart-Attacks and Strokes
·      7 Keys to Escape the Fur-lined Handcuffs The Five Biggest “No-No”s Dental Graduates Make
·      How to Avoid Them and Become Wealthier Turning Your Dental Practice Into a Business
